archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0317
archimate:Requirement.documentation: We need to be able to add legacy services to an existing DX account. (A customer may move a mobile and then fixed at a later date)

properties.value: Example: Either they have migrated mobile only before without fixed or they already have an account in DX and want to migrate fixed. A nice to have is to have some mechanism that would help in identifying that the transitioned customer is already registered.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
